profile.name: Jonas Schmedtmann
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | MongoDB & Digital
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a strong passion for database sharding, front-end development, and delivering high-quality solutions.
profile.company:
Based on the provided information, I would recommend the following companies:

1. MongoDB
2. Digital

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Digital
description: Designed and developed scalable backend systems using Node.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Improved code quality and reduced bugs through rigorous testing and refactoring.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom web applications using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for various clients.
Managed multiple projects simultaneously while maintaining high-quality standards.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of MongoDB's open-source project.
Improved code quality, fixed bugs, and implemented new features.
